nodes.text: Saddlebulls were a non-sentient species domesticated by the Chiss. Chiss sometimes rode Saddlebulls for entertainment purposes, and they appeared in the expression "When you see the saddlebull is about to throw you, jump off." Senior Captain Xodlak'in'daro thought of that expression when her Xodlak family censured her, possibly with the expectation of expelling her from that Chiss family, and Irizi family Syndic Zistalmu offered her a chance to join the Irizi as a Trial-born.
